stripped_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance jinteki cards in your deck. Draw 3 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [jinteki] cards in your deck. Draw 3 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
title: Heritage Committee
